explains: n. 狗仔队（专门追逐名人偷拍照片的摄影者或记者, paparazzo 的复数）

sentences.en: The paparazzi pursue Armani wherever he travels.
sentences.cn: 狗仔队追着阿玛尼到他去的任何地方。

sentences.en: "I don't do paparazzi anymore," confesses Galella, who is now 79.
sentences.cn: 现年79岁的格拉拉说：“我以后不会再做狗仔队了，我也跑不动了，因为我患有关节炎。”

sentences.en: Treat the paparazzi as your friends until you don't need them anymore.
sentences.cn: 把狗仔队当成朋友，直到你不再需要他们。
